text: Usnija Redžepova (; 4 February 1946 - 1 October 2015) was a Macedonian who belongend to the Romani people actress and singer. She appeared in the movies Zenidba nosaca Samuela (1973), The Dervish and Death (1974) and Kostana (1980). She was given a national pension from the Serbian government on 29 December 2011. Redžepova was born in Skopje. She was of Romani people. She died from lung cancer in Belgrade, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Movie actors Category:Musicians from Skopje Category:Singers Category:Television actors Category:Roma people
title: Usnija Redžepova
